remark.p: Foreign Service Officer. Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary (Venezuela); Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary (Saint Vincent and the Grenadines); Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary (Saint Lucia); Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary (Saint Kitts and Nevis); Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary (Honduras); Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary (Grenada); Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary (Dominica); Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary (Antigua and Barbuda); Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary (Barbados).
